column4: Wow. My very DEFAULT X just crashed on me, standard from the properly burned, perfectly installed Ubuntu Breezy Badger, and nobody is freaking out?!
what mplayer driver were you using?
Again, I can't be sure what I was playing at the time. Some files were actually deleted or moved when I had finished watching them.
Oooh.. I like the sound of THAT feature! :P
many are waiting for an implementation
it's not ascii or keyboard scancode
keys values are in the format YXXX where Y is the device number. 0 means keyboard and XXX is the SDL define for the desired key (read SDL_keysym.h).
I'm not finding an SDL_keysym.h. Are you?
you would need to install the libsdl dev package
I'm looking at The SDL keysyms online. They look nothing like this! It shows things like SDLK_h for h
